generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A paved area adjacent to the road, separated by a curb, is visible on the right side of the image, designated for pedestrians or cyclists.
- building: A large brick building with multiple windows is prominently visible on the right side of the image, and other commercial buildings are visible in the background.
- wall: The brick building on the right side of the image has a continuous brick wall along its base.
- fence: A low brick wall with a top edge, separating the road from a parking area, is visible on the left side of the image.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting streetlights and traffic signs.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including a directional sign with an arrow and a sign indicating a roundabout.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the road, particularly on the left side and in the background.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the roadside, particularly on the left side of the image.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and blue.
- person: A person wearing a helmet is visible riding a motorcycle on the road.
- rider: The person on the motorcycle is classified as a rider.
- car: Several cars are parked in the background on the left side of the image.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the road, being ridden by a person.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
